Detailed Description

A GfxPOIFeature.

Represensts a point of interest.

const MC2SimpleString& GfxPOIFeature::getCustomImageName (   )  const
 

Get the custom image name of the poi.

byte GfxPOIFeature::getExtraInfo (   )  const [inline]
 

Get the extra info, that can mean different things depending on the poi type.

For citycentre, extra info is display class. If m_customImageName is set to a value, then the extra info is the tilemap scalelevel where the poi should be shown.

Returns:
The extra info.

Definition at line 1376 of file GfxFeature.h.

The custom image name of the POI.

byte GfxPOIFeature::m_extraInfo [private]
 

The extra info, that can mean different things depending on the poi type.

For citycentre, extra info is display class. If m_customImageName is set to a value, then the extra info is the tilemap scalelevel where the poi should be shown.
